remarks: An ordered pair theorem for ` _om ` .  Theorem 17.3 of [Quine] p. 124. This proof is adapted from ~ nn0opthi .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2012.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
statement:
omopth.1 $e |- A e. _om $.
omopth.2 $e |- B e. _om $.
omopth.3 $e |- C e. _om $.
omopth.4 $e |- D e. _om $.
omopthi $p |- ( ( ( ( A +o B ) .o ( A +o B ) ) +o B ) = ( ( ( C +o D ) .o ( C +o D ) ) +o D ) <-> ( A = C /\ B = D ) ) $.
